flawed_nl_solution:
If Phil had won 3 games more than did Charlie, and Phil won 12 games, then Charlie won 12-3=<<12-3=9>>9 games.
If Charlie had won 2 games fewer than Dana, and Charlie won 9 games, then Dana won 9+2=<<9+2=10>>10 games.
If Perry had won 5 more games than did Dana, and Dana won 10 games, then Perry won 10+5=<<10+5=15>>15 games.
Thus, Perry won 15-12=<<15-12=3>>3 more games than did Phil.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 11, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
